right-comments: Post comments on a wiki page
right-comments-manage: Manage comments that users have posted
right-comments-import: Import comments from a JSON file
yappin-no-js: Please wait while this container loads. Note: JavaScript must be enabled in your browser.
yappin-visualeditor-wikitext-warning: Comments do not support manually inserting wikitext.
yappin-load-error: There was an error loading the comments (code: $1). Please try again later.
yappin-generic-error-comment-missing: The comment with ID $1 does not exist.
yappin-generic-error-notself: You cannot modify another user's comment.
yappin-submit-error-page-missing: Page with ID $1 does not exist.
yappin-submit-error-parent-missing: The parent comment $1 does not exist.
yappin-submit-error-parent-hasparent: Cannot reply to a comment which already has a parent.
yappin-submit-error-noperm: You do not have permission to post or edit a comment.
yappin-submit-error-spam: Your comment has been blocked as it has been identified as harmful.
yappin-upload-error-noperm: You do not have permission to upload files to comments.
yappin-upload-error-unknown: An unknown error occurred while uploading the file. Code: $1
yappin-submit-error-comments-disabled: Comments cannot be submitted for this page.
yappin-no-script: You must have JavaScript enabled in your browser to view and interact with comments.
yappin-commentcontrol-success: Page [[$1]]'s comment control status changed to $2.
log-description-comments: Tracks events related to comments on the wiki
logentry-comments-control: $1 {{GENDER:$2|changed comment control status}} of page $3 to $4
yappin-import-file-label: Upload a JSON file containing the comments to be imported
yappin-import-skip-existing: Skip comments that already exist by checking the timestamp
yappin-import-attach-users: Attribute comments to local wiki users with the same username
yappin-import-no-file: No file was uploaded in this import
yappin-import-file-too-large: The provided file is too large. Please split it into smaller chunks
yappin-import-upload-error: File upload failed with error code $1
yappin-import-page-not-found: Page $1 is not found on this wiki
notification-header-yappin-user-page: [[User:$1]] made a comment on your user page [[$2]]
notification-header-yappin-mention: [[User:$1]] mentioned you in a comment on [[$2]]
